entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
